name: Domains Switcher
author: ShyM

sections.description: Simple plugin which helps one update database fields for domain information. You can read more here: http://elfdreamer.blogspot.com/2011/02/wordpress-plugin-domains-update.html
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload fomains-switcher4.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In admin area a new option appears under Settings: Update Domains

short_description: Edit database to change wordpress site's domains
description: Simple plugin which helps one update database fields for domain information. You can read more here: http://elfdreamer.blogspot.com/2011/02/wordpress-plugin-domains-update.html
